The world would come to a complete standstill: The internet has become an integral part of our daily lives, and without it, our lives would be completely different. We would no longer be able to communicate with our friends and family, access information, shop, or even work. This would lead to a complete standstill in the world.
The economy would collapse: The internet has revolutionized the way we do business, and without it, many businesses would not be able to survive. This would lead to a collapse of the economy.

Information would become scarce: The internet has made it possible to access information from all over the world. Without it, information would become scarce, and we would be left in the dark about many things.

Education would suffer: The internet has made it possible for people to learn from anywhere in the world. Without it, education would suffer, and many people would be left without access to knowledge.

Social networking would come to an end: The internet has made it possible for people to connect with each other from all over the world. Without it, social networking would come to an end, and people would be left isolated and disconnected.
